name: Kratom-Induced Cholestatic Hepatitis with Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome
chief_complaint: I can't stop using kratom for my back pain, but now my skin is yellow and I feel terrible when I try to quit
prognosis: Guarded - depends on cessation of kratom use and degree of liver damage. Full recovery possible with abstinence but risk of chronic liver disease if continued use.
description: A complex presentation of hepatotoxicity from chronic high-dose kratom use (20-30g/day for 18 months) compounded by opioid-like withdrawal symptoms upon cessation. The condition represents both the toxic effects of mitragynine alkaloids on hepatocytes and the neuroadaptation to its opioid receptor activity.
risk_factors: Lack of medical supervision during tapering
Concurrent use of other hepatotoxic substances
